summary: An alienated young man flirts with extremism during a major student protest.
cast: Shin'ichirô Mikami|Shima Iwashita|Kayoko Honoo|Hizuru Takachiho|Kazuya Kosaka|Junichiro Yamashita|Yachiyo Ôtori|Yûnosuke Itô|Eiko Kujo|Shinji Takano|Yuki Tominaga|Keiko Kuni|Kimihiko Takeda|Yosuke Hayashi|Teiko Sawamura|Shinji Tanaka|Kakuko Kusajima|Hiroshi Nagashima|Takao Kiyomiya|Shûji Terayama|Norikazu Takeda|Reiko Minakami|Tsutomu Haruyama|Tomoko Saitô|Hideo Matsuno|Jô Mitsumura|Egyô Ôkubo|Nobuo Takagi|Yôko Chimura|Haruko Chichibu|Tomoka Hasebe
title: Kawaita mizuumi
